1.content: Alright then, what gender will be dominating?
1.title: Getting Started.

1112.content:
Chazz woke up in a daze, trying to recognise his surroundings helped him figure that he was in one of the Silfer dorm rooms. The rooms that he had his condo built to avoid, and he could also see two people who had seemed to either be as stupid as humanly possible or were very determined to send him to an early grave.

"Jaden, Jesse, what's going on?" He could remember walking down to the Academy, on a really hot day, before it all went black and he could now see that both Jaden and Jesse were only in their boxers. It was more than a little bit awkward.

Jesse was the first to see that Chazz had woken up. "Mornin' sleeping beauty." He cheerfully teased before getting Jaden's attention, the latter being more than a little busy trying to keep himself cool with one of those small, electric fans. Jaden saw that Chazz was up and also gave of a big smile.

"Sup Chazz, nice to see you're up." Jaden then ran over and looked down at something. "Though it's better that this stayed on." Chazz looked down and found that his lower legs had been tied together, preventing him from moving in any way other than crawling.

"What the hell is this!" Chazz began shouting loudly and threatening them with physical violence when he felt something gag his mouth, tasting horrific, and found that Jesse had placed it in. It being his discarded socks.

Muffled screams of fury came from Chazz as Jaden and Jesse were trying to explain that him serving their feet would keep them cool while the fans they had to work on everything else. It appeared that they were now discussing whether to start now or wait for Chazz to tire himself out.
1112.title: Chazz

choices: Let Chazz take off Jaden and Jesse's socks
Let Jaden and Jesse take off their socks
11121.content:
They decided to do it now


Karen and Jesse starts off their shoes and pays a ton of Chazz
11121.title: Do it now.

111211.content:
Jaden started first
Jaden put his feet near Chazz's mouth and said: You can take my socks off your mouth or you want to lose the deck
Chazz no choice Chazz started to pull his socks out, the stench makes him cry and just The left and right socks are removed
111211.title: Let Chazz take off Jaden and Jesse's socks

112.content: Who gets put in their place?
112.title: Syrus

1151.content: Who's going to be serving him?
1151.title: Atticus

1152.content: Who's going to be dominated by him?
1152.title: Bastion

12.content: Which one do you want to focus on?
12.title: Getting Your Girl On!

121.content: Who will be worshipping her feet then?
121.title: Alexis

1212.content:
"W-Wh-What?"

Chazz Princeton was wondering how he got here. With Alexis sitting on her bed, him sitting on a chair next to it and her feet being placed near his face, how did this happen again?

Oh yeah, he had gotten a rather flirty letter from her which suggested that he head to her room and they "change their relationship a bit". Naturally, he ran towards her dorm and waited eagerly outside her room. Alexis had opened the door, wearing her normal uniform without boots or socks, and had invited him in and to take a seat in the chair near her bed and gave him the order which confused him.

"You heard me," She said in a tone that did not seem to offer argument against it. "Worship them and you get a date."

Alexis wanted him to worship her feet? Chazz was not sure that he would have this hesitation if she offered to go out with him, his self-esteem wasn't as tough as his boasts, but for a date alone? This was probably a joke.

"Um, why do you want me to do that?" Might as well play along with the joke, though Alexis' expression didn't seem to change at all in response to that.

"I want to know if you're not just doing it for my looks and that you actually care about me." If he really liked her, he would be fine with obeying this order that she gave and be an obedient little slave for her. Chazz seemed to be weighing up the decision and Alexis was sure that he would kneel to her desires.

"I do! It's just that this seems a bit...extreme." Looks like he needed to be reminded of what he was going to get.

"Do it and you get a date."

Chazz replied to the offer with....
1212.title: Chazz

12121.content:
Alexis frowned at Chazz, expecting him to be a bit more grateful about her offer. "You don't sound very eager." She said before slapping his face slightly with her right foot. "Thank me for this opportunity."

Chazz grimaced at what he was having to do as he then took the foot that had slapped him and began lightly kissing the sole, forcing a smile to his face to try and please Alexis. "Thank you for allowing me to serve at your feet."

"That's better." Alexis smugly stated before deciding on another order. "Start massaging my feet."

"Yes, Alexis." Chazz soon took the foot he was kissing and began to knead his fingers into it.

"It's Mistress now." The blonde duellist was having a bit of a power-surge and wanted to make sure that her slave knew exactly where his place was.

Chazz quickly caught on with the programme. "Yes mistress."

Alexis soon gave her next order. "While you're massaging one foot, you can use one hand for that and then swap when I tell you to, and use the other to hold my other foot while you..."
12121.title: "Alright then."

info.brief_description: The world of 'Yu-Gi-Oh GX!' and feet come together! Everyone's invited!
info.description: This interactive story focuses on the characters in the world of Yu-Gi-Oh Gx!, and feet (having it as torture for the worshipper would be appreciated but pleasure is fine). Add anything your heart desires, and just have fun! (Quality will be controlled though and try to avoid one-line additions)
